                        <Cell><InputField id="ccEquipment" placeholder="Wargear" /></Cell>
                    </Row>
                    <Row preferredHeight="37">
                        <Cell class="ym-blackCell"><Text preferredWidth="10"></Text><Text class="ym-whiteTextLeft">PSYCHIC POWERS:</Text></Cell>
                        <!-- have to put a space at the end or it gets read as "No placeholder" -->
                        <Cell><InputField id="ccPsychicPowers" placeholder="None " /></Cell>
                    </Row>
                    <Row preferredHeight="37">
                        <Cell class="ym-blackCell"><Text preferredWidth="10"></Text><Text class="ym-whiteTextLeft">WARLORD TRAIT:</Text></Cell>
                        <Cell><InputField id="ccWarlordTrait" placeholder="None " /></Cell>
                    </Row>
                    <Row preferredHeight="37">
                        <Cell class="ym-blackCell"><Text preferredWidth="10"></Text><Text class="ym-whiteTextLeft">RELIC:</Text></Cell>
                        <Cell><InputField id="ccRelic" placeholder="None " /></Cell>
                    </Row>
                </TableLayout>
                <TableLayout preferredWidth="375" cellPadding="0">
                    <Row preferredHeight="37">
                        <Cell class="ym-blackCellCenter"><Text class="ym-whiteTextCenter">OTHER UPGRADES AND SELECTABLE ABILITIES</Text></Cell>
                    </Row>
                    <Row preferredHeight="148">
                        <Cell><InputField id="ccOtherUpgrades" placeholder="Litanies, Exarch Powers, etc." lineType="MultiLineNewLine" /></Cell>
                    </Row>
                </TableLayout>
            </HorizontalLayout>
            <TableLayout>
                <Row preferredHeight="35">
                    <Cell class="ym-blackCellCenter" columnSpan="3"><Text class="ym-whiteTextCenter">COMBAT TALLIES</Text></Cell>
                </Row>
                <Row preferredHeight="35">
                    <Cell>
                        <HorizontalLayout spacing="20">
                            <Text class="ym-smallBold" fontSize="16">TOTAL UNITS KILLED:</Text>
                            <HorizontalLayout flexibleWidth="1" spacing="10">
                                <Button id="totalKillsDown" class="ym-button" text="-" />
                                <Text id="totalKills" class="ym-mediumBold">0</Text>
                                <Button id="totalKillsUp" class="ym-button" text="+" />
                            </HorizontalLayout>
                        </HorizontalLayout>
                    </Cell>
                    <Cell>
                        <HorizontalLayout spacing="20">
                            <Text class="ym-smallBold" fontSize="16">BATTLES PLAYED:</Text>
                            <HorizontalLayout flexibleWidth="1" spacing="10">
                                <Button id="playedDown" class="ym-button" text="-" />
                                <Text id="played" class="ym-mediumBold">0</Text>
                                <Button id="playedUp" class="ym-button" text="+" />
                            </HorizontalLayout>
                        </HorizontalLayout>
                    </Cell>
                    <Cell>
                        <HorizontalLayout spacing="20">
                            <Text class="ym-smallBold" fontSize="16">BATTLES SURVIVED:</Text>
                            <HorizontalLayout flexibleWidth="1" spacing="10">
                                <Button id="survivedDown" class="ym-button" text="-" />
                                <Text id="survived" class="ym-mediumBold">0</Text>
                                <Button id="survivedUp" class="ym-button" text="+" />
                            </HorizontalLayout>
                        </HorizontalLayout>
                    </Cell>
                </Row>
            </TableLayout>
            <TableLayout columnWidths="0 35 0 35 0 35 0 35" cellPadding="0">
                <Row preferredHeight="35">
                    <Cell class="ym-blackCellCenter" columnSpan="8"><Text class="ym-whiteTextCenter">RANK</Text></Cell>
                </Row>
                <Row preferredHeight="35">
                    <Cell class="ym-blackCellCenter"><Text class="ym-whiteTextCenter">BLOODED</Text></Cell>
                    <Cell><ToggleButton id="ccBlooded" /></Cell>
                    <Cell class="ym-blackCellCenter"><Text class="ym-whiteTextCenter">BATTLE-HARDENED</Text></Cell>
                    <Cell><ToggleButton id="ccBattleHardened" /></Cell>
                    <Cell class="ym-blackCellCenter"><Text class="ym-whiteTextCenter">HEROIC</Text></Cell>
                    <Cell><ToggleButton id="ccHeroic" /></Cell>
                    <Cell class="ym-blackCellCenter"><Text class="ym-whiteTextCenter">LEGENDARY</Text></Cell>
                    <Cell><ToggleButton id="ccLegendary" /></Cell>
                </Row>
                <Row preferredHeight="70">
                    <Cell class="ym-blackCell"><Text preferredWidth="10"></Text><Text class="ym-whiteTextLeft">BATTLE HONORS:</Text></Cell>
                    <Cell columnSpan="7"><InputField id="ccBattleHonors" placeholder="None " lineType="MultiLineNewLine" /></Cell>
                </Row>
                <Row preferredHeight="70">
                    <Cell class="ym-blackCell"><Text preferredWidth="10"></Text><Text class="ym-whiteTextLeft">BATTLE SCARS:</Text></Cell>
                    <Cell columnSpan="7"><InputField id="ccBattleScars" placeholder="None " lineType="MultiLineNewLine" /></Cell>
                </Row>
            </TableLayout>
        </VerticalLayout>
    </VerticalLayout>

    <VerticalLayout class="ym-window" id="dataCard" height="390" width="700" color="#ffffff00">
        <Panel preferredHeight="40" childForceExpandWidth="false" color="White">
            <Text id="data-unitName" class="ym-bold" />
            <Panel rectAlignment="UpperRight" height="30" width="30">
                <Button class="ym-button" color="Red" textColor="White" id="dataCardCloseButton">X</Button>
            </Panel>
        </Panel>
        <VerticalLayout color="White">
            <VerticalScrollView><!-- not setting a preferred height, hopefully it expands properly -->
                <VerticalLayout height="1000" padding="10" horizontalOverflow="Wrap" spacing="30" id="dataCardContentContainer">
                    <VerticalLayout id="keywordContainer" preferredHeight="70">
                        <HorizontalLayout spacing="2" preferredHeight="20">
                            <Text class="ym-smallBold" alignment="MiddleLeft" preferredWidth="93">Faction: </Text><Text class="ym-resizingSmallBold" id="factionKeywords" horizontalOverflow="Wrap" />
                        </HorizontalLayout>
                        <HorizontalLayout id="keywordList" spacing="3" preferredHeight="50">
                            <Text class="ym-smallBold">Keywords:  </Text><Text class="ym-resizingSmallBold" id="keywords" horizontalOverflow="Wrap" flexibleHeight="1" alignment="UpperLeft" />
                        </HorizontalLayout>
                    </VerticalLayout>

                    <VerticalLayout id="powersKnownContainer" active="false">
                        <TableLayout class="ym-psychic">
                            <Row class="ym-sectionHeader">
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">Name</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">WC</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">Range</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">Description</Text></Cell>
                            </Row>
                        </TableLayout>
                        <TableLayout id="powersKnown" class="ym-psychic" />
                    </VerticalLayout>

                    <VerticalLayout id="psykerProfilesContainer" active="false">
                        <TableLayout class="ym-psychic">
                            <Row class="ym-sectionHeader">
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">Name</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">Cast</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">Deny</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">Can Know</Text></Cell>
                            </Row>
                        </TableLayout>
                        <TableLayout id="psykerProfiles" class="ym-psychic" />
                    </VerticalLayout>
                    
                    <VerticalLayout>
                        <TableLayout class="ym-models">
                            <Row class="ym-sectionHeader">
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">Name</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">M</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">WS</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">BS</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">S</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">T</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">W</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">A</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">Ld</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">Sv</Text></Cell>
                            </Row>
                        </TableLayout>
                        <TableLayout id="models" class="ym-models" />
                    </VerticalLayout>
                   
                    <VerticalLayout>
                        <TableLayout class="ym-weapons">
                            <Row class="ym-sectionHeader">
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">Name</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">Range</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">Type</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">S</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">AP</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">D</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-smallBold">Abilities</Text></Cell>
                            </Row>
                        </TableLayout>
                        <TableLayout id="weapons" class="ym-weapons" />
                    </VerticalLayout>
                    
                    <VerticalLayout>
                        <TableLayout class="ym-abilities">
                            <Row class="ym-sectionHeader">
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-bold">Abilities</Text></Cell>
                                <Cell><Text class="ym-bold">Description</Text></Cell>
                            </Row>
                        </TableLayout>
                        <TableLayout id="abilities" class="ym-abilities" />
                    </VerticalLayout>
                
                </VerticalLayout>
            </VerticalScrollView>
        </VerticalLayout>
        <HorizontalLayout color="#ffffff00" spacing="3" padding="7 0 0 0" preferredHeight="27" id="highlightButtonsContainer" />
    </VerticalLayout>


    <VerticalLayout class="ym-window" id="tallyCard" height="180" width="350">
        <HorizontalLayout preferredHeight="35" color="White" childForceExpandWidth="false" childForceExpandHeight="false" resizeTextForBestFit="true">
            <Text class="ym-bold" id="tally-UnitName" flexibleWidth="1" fontSize="20" />
            <Button class="ym-button" color="Red" textColor="White" id="tallyCardCloseButton">X</Button>
        </HorizontalLayout>
        <VerticalLayout spacing="5" padding="0 0 5 5" id="tallyContainer" />
    </VerticalLayout>
</Panel>
